properties.entry: Lock out substation voltage regulators on the other two phases as well as all downline voltage regulators. For best results, step down one step on regulator right now and then up three steps after the timer expires that appears after 'Send Phase Detect Command' button is pressed. After voltage regulators are locked out press 'Send Phase Detect Command' when ready.
until you should tell the lineman to adjust the voltage regulators.
until you can tell the lineman to return the voltage regulators to normal.
Perform A Collection Action On These Meters
